page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT FOR COLD ASHTON.
page.content: The area is sparsely populated and has{no industry}so there is little scope for employment.The {farming}is a mixture of grass and cereals, dairy herds and sheep with very little in the way of other crops so there is not a great need for more than the few agricultural workers employed. The majority of the inhabitants of this lovely rolling countryside{commute}to Bath, Bristol,Kingswood and even further across the Severn Bridge to Wales and to London. The filling stations, garages and public houses serving more through traffic than local residents are mostly family concerns which employ only extra{part-time}help.Residents of the larger houses employ local daily help for the house and garden. Some live in cottages on the estates.
